subject: Missing Baseplate
description_text:
Hi,

I recently received my Simsonn Pro Plus Pedal set and I am missing the
baseplate with my order #SSN1886.

Can you confirm if this comes separately or provide an ETA on this delivery?

Thank you,

conversations.body_text: Hi Zach Grapner,    Here's the logistical tracking link for your baseplate.  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=1ZH912Y00309956021
